feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
